name: Arachne
overview: Arachne is an evil sect that is spread all over the world, it has enormous power. The purpose of the sect is wake up enormous supernatural powers and take over the world. They do this by kidnapping people with special mental abilities and drain them of their energy, and leave the bodies to die. It's up to you to stop their evil plans. Published as Oberator in Italy in Hit Parade C64 n.73 (dicembre 1992), Nova Games n.25 (Novembre 1988) and I Magnifici 5 & 7 n.33 (aprile 1988.
